title: How to Name a Folder Con on a Computer

steps.title: First off, use the numbers on the number pad, not the ones at the top of the keyboard.
steps.content: First off, use the numbers on the number pad, not the ones at the top of the keyboard.

steps.title: Create a new folder.
steps.content: Create a new folder. Name it "Con" but don't press enter yet. Hold down Alt and type 255 and Alt+0160 on the number pad, then press enter.

steps.title: Press the fn key and press the letter keys k-i-i to make use of the number pad.
steps.content: Press the fn key and press the letter keys k-i-i to make use of the number pad.

steps.title: Go to command prompt in your computer and type md\\.
steps.content: Go to command prompt in your computer and type md\\. \\c:\\con [Note: you can give whatever path you want in place of c:] Tada! The folder has been created. Remember, you must use the command prompt to delete it as well, by typing rd\\.\\c:\con.
